actionTemplate.title: Blush placement for square-round faces
steps: Sweep a soft “atmosphere” blush across upper cheek area
Place a brighter “plumping” blush on the apple of the cheek
Add a deeper “contracting” blush toward the outer cheek to slim
Blend upward toward temples; avoid placing blush too low
Lightly tap leftover blush on nose tip for harmony if desired

rationaleTemplate: Layering 3 blush depths adds lift and reduces squareness
Higher placement keeps the face from looking wider
